tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ArtworkRecords (
  artwork_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  artwork_title VARCHAR(255),
  artist_name VARCHAR(255),
  restoration_date DATE,
  restoration_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Restoration_Log (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    artwork_id INT,
    conservator TEXT,
    restoration_date DATE,
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Artwork (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   title VARCHAR(255),
   artist VARCHAR(255),
   year_created INT,
   restoration_history TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE RestorationRecord (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   artwork_id INT,
   conservator_id INT,
   date_started DATE,
   date_completed DATE,
   description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Artwork (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    artist VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    year INT,
    creation_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Restoration (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    artwork_id INT REFERENCES Artwork(id),
    conservator_id INT REFERENCES Conservator(id),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    status VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'In Progress'
);

CREATE TABLE Preservation (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    artwork_id INT REFERENCES Artwork(id),
    conservator_id INT REFERENCES Conservator(id),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    method VARCHAR(255),
    notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE RestorationWork ( 
    work_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    artwork_id INT, 
    conservator_id INT, 
    work_description TEXT, 
    date_started DATE, 
    date_completed DATE, 
    FOREIGN KEY (artwork_id) REFERENCES Artwork(artwork_id), 
    FOREIGN KEY (conservator_id) REFERENCES Conservator(conservator_id) 
);

CREATE TABLE PreservationWork ( 
    work_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    artwork_id INT, 
    conservator_id INT, 
    work_description TEXT, 
    date_started DATE, 
    date_completed DATE, 
    FOREIGN KEY (artwork_id) REFERENCES Artwork(artwork_id), 
    FOREIGN KEY (conservator_id) REFERENCES Conservator(conservator_id) 
);

CREATE TABLE ArtworkHistory ( 
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    artwork_id INT, 
    action_description TEXT, 
    action_date DATE, 
    FOREIGN KEY (artwork_id) REFERENCES Artwork(artwork_id) 
);
